Posts.Content: Ok so firstly my name is Jason and a new Macmillan volunteer. There is a amazing amount of information on Macmillan site for you supporting you sister and for your sister , what will be the next steps things you need to think about , it's up to you to be the strong prepared one giving information and direction don't let her feel your pain. If you go to bemacmillan on the main site there will be detailed booklets that you can order or download covering nutrition and what to expect , call the Macmillan helpline also they can direct you at point you in the right direction. Perpetration is the key , good luck , if I can be of any further assistance get in touch. Jason
Posts.Title: In shock, supporting my sister, how can I help?
